system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.h7JpSHtXSQYIjsWA]{Overcome} an enemy by getting out of their way,

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
on a 7+, you manage to get completely out of sight - your attacker loses track of you, although you must still pay a price on a 7-9 result.

Choose one:

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.ZrHnVfT943zF7FnE]{Pay the Price} to take the 10+ result, or create a temporary solution. A temporary solution will delay the threat, but when time is up, it'll be back in force - the Overlord will tell you when.

success.label: Success!
success.value:
You stop the obstacle, threat, Cut, or Move from causing harm.

on a 7+, you manage to get completely out of sight - your attacker loses track of you

On a 12+, everyone loses track of you - tell us where you went, and you're there.
